original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord by following the sins of Jeroboam son of Nebat, which he had caused Israel to commit, and he did not turn away from them.
korean_text: 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘에게 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄를 따라가고 거기서 떠나지 아니하였으므로

sentences.original_text: He did evil in the eyes of the Lord
by following the sins of Jeroboam son of Nebat
sentences.korean_translation: 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄를 좇아 행함이라

sentences.original_text: which he had caused Israel to commit
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이스라엘로 범하게 한 그 죄에서

sentences.original_text: and he did not turn away from them
